summary: A Group of followers from Brent Weeks' Night Angel Trilogy. Currently Includes Kylar Stern, and Durzo Blint.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds followers, from the Night Angel Trilogy, by Brent Weeks. Current Followers Included, are Kylar, and Durzo. So far all are stand alone, have no requirements, and can be found in The Winking Skeever, in Solitude. There are 4 Versions, Two versions with Kylar having white/silver hair, and two with Kylar having darker hair. There is also 1 version of the followers as protected, and another as essential. You only need to download 1 of the files, they all contain the files needed.

~~~ Kylar Stern ~~~
~Comes with Dark brotherhood armor, a ebony sword, and a ebony dagger
~Scales in level (Min 10, Max 81)
~Located in The Winking Skeever, in Solitude

Perks: Agile Defender, Stealth, Assassin's Blade, Backstab, Muffled Movement, Shadow Warrior, Armsman, Dual Flurry, Wind Walker, Bladesman

Magic: Invisiblity, Muffle
Shouts: Elemental Fury, Marked For Death

Combat Style: Wetboy (Stealth, Dual Wield)

~~~ Durzo Blint ~~~
~Comes with Dark brotherhood armor, a ebony sword, and a ebony dagger. Also has 100 Ebony Arrows, and a ebony bow.
~Scales in level (Min 20, Max 100)
~Located in The Winking Skeever, in Solitude

Perks: Agile Defender, Armsman, Assassin's Blade, Backstab, Deft Movement, Dual Flurry, Windwalker, Shadow Warrior, Stealth, Muffled Movement

Magic: Detect Dead, Detect Life, Fast Healing, Healing, Insivibility
Shouts: Elemental Fury, Marked For Death, Bcome Ethereal 

Combat Style: Wetboy (Stealth, Dual Wield)

~~~ Recommended Mods ~~~
Evil MasterMind Armor by Satyr ZeroFrost
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25476
This is my NUMBER ONE recommended mod. It fits the wetboy's perfectly.

Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi by urshi
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488



~~~ Q&A ~~~
Q: A wetboy? What the heck is a wetboy?
A: As quoted from Night Angel Wikia, "Wetboys are the perfect killers that use the Talent."

Q: That sounds an awful lot like an assassin...
A: Again, as quoted... "an assassin has a target, because assassins sometimes miss," also "assassins have targets, wetboys have deaders. Because once a wetboy accepts a contract, that person's days are numbered. "Wetboys are to assassins like a tiger is to a kitten." "

Q: What amazing book is all of this based on?
A: The Night Angel Trilogy by Brent Weeks. (The Way of Shadows, Shadow's Edge, Beyond the Shadows)

~~~ Updates ~~~
Version 2.10: Added essential versions, and a silver haired version. Also fixed Durzo not actually being a follower
Version 2.00: Changed name to Night Angel Followers, added Durzo
Version 1.06: Fixed the download to be the proper file.
Version 1.05: Added Face Gen Data, AI Package, Changed Perks.
Version 1.00: Created, tested a bit, and uploaded.

~~~ Credits ~~~
Zerofrost for making me decide to actually make a Kylar follower
Brent Weeks for writing an amazing trilogy!

~~~ Random Notes ~~~
I just threw together version 2.10 very quickly, so I didn't really have time to check and make sure everything worked properly with all 4 esps. I'm in the process of moving, so I don't have all that much time to check and make sure things work
author: Fantil Swift
